price: 105. En zij vragen jou over de bergen, zeg: “Mijn Heer zal hen als stofdeeltjes doen opgaan”
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسۡفٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿani al-jibāli faqul yansifuhā rabbī nasfan
